An Absolute Gem
Luke Cruise & Harcourts Dandenong have the pleasure of bringing to the market this large, light filled and immaculately presented 4-bedroom home in a tightly held estate in Dandenong.
You may be forgiven for thinking that this home is like any other, but then when you step inside you will be met by a king size bedroom on your right and a fastidiously maintained loungeroom on your left.
The home itself comprises of two living areas, the first at the front of the home and the second living area located at the rear of the home.
The spacious kitchen and meals area is adorned by an outdoor entertainment area, complete with overhead fan, professional decking and laserlight.
The Kitchen has a double sink, dishwasher, rangehood and ample natural lighting.
You can relax in the tiled bathroom with spa, or you may wish to get lost in your thought in the tranquil rear garden, or for those cooler winter nights, sit in front of the gas fireplace.

For ease of access, or for those wanting to park their trailer or boat in the back, the garage has both front and rear roller doors.
57 metres to the nearest bus stop and with Dandenong Train Station not too far, all your public transport is at your finger tips.
